entry.title: Sunday: Rain. High 13.
entry.summary: Rain ending this morning then cloudy. Wind southeast 20 km/h gusting to 40. High 13. UV index 4 or moderate. Forecast issued 5:00 AM EDT Sunday 30 April 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Rain. Low 9.
entry.summary: Rain. Amount 5 to 10 mm except 20 mm over western sections. Wind east 20 km/h gusting to 40 increasing to 40 gusting to 70 this evening. Low 9. Forecast issued 5:00 AM EDT Sunday 30 April 2023

entry.title: Monday: Rain. High 14.
entry.summary: Rain ending near noon then a mix of sun and cloud with 40 percent chance of showers. Amount 5 to 10 mm except 15 mm over western sections. Wind east 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming southwest 20 in the afternoon. High 14. UV index 7 or high. Forecast issued 5:00 AM EDT Sunday 30 April 2023
